resources.string: Breeze through logins! Use biometrics (fingerprint unlock) or a PIN to unlock your Dashlane app quickly and securely.
Breeze through logins! Use your PIN to log into Dashlane quickly and securely on this device.
Biometrics or PIN unlock is required to set up 2FA

To set up 2FA for Dashlane, you need to pair this app with the Authenticator app. Biometrics or PIN unlock is required to pair these apps.\n\nYou can update your unlock methods in your security settings at any time.
